text: John Aylward (November 7, 1946 â€“ May 16, 2022) was an American actor. He was best known for playing the former DNC chairman Barry Goodwin on the NBC television series The West Wing and for playing Dr. Donald Anspaugh on the NBC television series ER. He was born in Seattle, Washington. Aylward died in Seattle on May 16, 2022, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Seattle
title: John Aylward
